html:
11.10.20  1:05 pm   Is it ok to listen to your songs while doing school work?

     sure

     Also, is there an ETA for your next song?

     i wish

11.10.20  12:08 pm   what do your videos taste like if they were food

      normal

11.10.20  11:59 am   Should I learn the banjo?

      sure

11.10.20  11:04 am   how can i express everything i feel when i have so little time and everything is fleeting? music seems like the obvious answer but getting it right is so tricky

      you may have to get it partially wrong. that's actually what everyone else does

11.10.20  10:36 am   why don't cars sing?

      maybe because you didn't turn it on

11.10.20  10:20 am   Got any spiritual advice?

      yes

11.10.20  9:50 am   opinion about doors?

      sometimes they seem too good to be true

11.10.20  9:36 am   What's brown and sticky

      chocolate

11.10.20  9:31 am   What's a good way to self-teach piano and/or guitar?

      just start playing

11.10.20  9:22 am   What do I do when I can't remember how to be a person?

      sing a song

11.10.20  9:20 am   how do i be a thing 

      you have to convince 2 other things to be your parents, by making sweet love to each other, and giving birth to a brand new thing which is you

11.10.20  9:15 am   How hard is it to make a song melody that's original? like one that hasn't already been written or sung before?

      very easy, especially if you think about something else besides the melody. for example: look at a pile of dust, and imagine a character climbing over that pile of dust. it is probable that no other pile of dust in history has ever had that exact shape. so therefore, the melody that comes out of that will be entirely new

11.10.20  8:18 am   How do I be productive?

      at what

11.10.20  7:23 am   how do you come up with your video ideas?

      sometimes i pretend i'm in kansas and i'm supposed to decide which side of the road the land is on

11.10.20  6:50 am   When is your next song?

      right away

11.10.20  5:12 am   i have a lovehate relationship with airports but gahdamn at the airport terminal makes them sound quite pleasant.  how do you manage to create this effect on the listener?!

      music helps, for sure

11.10.20  4:05 am   Are you working on one big project or a bunch of small ones?

      how about a bunch of normal sized ones

11.10.20  3:21 am   your art is Amazing, should I Quit making Things, knowing that I'm Terrible, and Will never Make it to your Point in Acheivement or success. . .. ?

      no

11.10.20  2:46 am   What's your favorite joke?

      'truth', and 'facts'

11.10.20  2:45 am   Do you have any physical or mental disabilities or disorders?

      i have a mental tendency to take everything to extremes. then, when i catch myself doing this, i make an extreme demand on myself never to go to extremes. then, when i catch myself doing that, i make an extreme demand on myself to never make extreme demands. and so the cycle of life unfolds

11.10.20  2:38 am   why is everything so dumb and stupid?

      this is due to intelligence

11.10.20  2:30 am   What is normal?

      tables,

11.10.20  2:06 am   if you had to pick your favorite type of thing, what might it be? 

      oblique

11.10.20  1:58 am   are tuesdays your favorite day of the week?

      i admit it is very tasty

11.10.20  1:30 am   Is your unique aesthetic for your music/videos inspired at all from someone else,

     there is probably general inspiration from everyone

     or is it something you made completely your self?

     basically what usually happens is, i get a trillion ideas in my mind of what i WISH it could be like. then i get extremely disappointed to realize that none of those ways are actually possible for me to do. then, sometimes, i am able to find 1 way that is just barely possible. and i settle for doing it that way

11.10.20  12:34 am   How difficult is it to be a songwriter?

     it's impossible, yet also effortless. this may seem like a paradox. welcome to songwriting

     I plan to be one someday, but I do notice that it requires a lot of time to learn.

     you can only learn it by doing it. so you might as well get started

11.10.20  12:19 am   mr wurtz i just wanted to say thank you for making so much music and videos over the years . your art has really helped me when ive been in rough patches of my life. how do you find the motivation to keep creating and doing it all? 

      will melt if i don't

11.10.20  12:10 am   what do you think about climate change?

      change it again. it's still not right

11.9.20  10:51 pm   what is your opinion on oranges

      they are a lot like apples

11.9.20  10:26 pm   here's an idea: start a song with simple instrumentation and the moving text on black background animation you had in like 2011.

     actually in 2011 i didn't know how to move the text. i didn't really figure that out until around 2014

      then the better crazier with more instruments music jumps in and the simple animation morphs or transitions into your new style. it'll be an illustration of ho far you've come, or something

     i am generally following that principle, with videos starting very simple and then becoming more complex. the unfortunate part is that it may not appear that i have actually come very far. but we'll see

11.9.20  10:15 pm   What inspired your style (editing or music-ing)?

      first i imagine 10,000 ways i wish it could be. then i realize all those ways are impossible for me to do. then after a brief moment of despair, i am sometimes able to find 1 way that is possible. and then i do it that way

11.9.20  10:10 pm   is there even a such thing as 3d software if you're really just scaling 2d shapes in such a way that resembles there being a third dimension

      you don't have to do that part yourself, the computer has very strict rules of how to do it so it obeys the principles of 3D perspective perfectly. so i would say that counts as 3D

11.9.20  10:01 pm   about how long did it take to make the video for "i'm crazy/it's raining"?

      maybe about 5 weeks

11.9.20  9:41 pm   do you ever listen to non-English music?

      yes

11.9.20  9:10 pm   Does your music confine itself to one genre,

     what the heck is a genre

     or do you believe it to be something unique?

      we'll see

11.9.20  8:47 pm   do you have any advice for aspiring music artists (for one year now)

     i think you have aspired for long enough. it's time to start doing the music

     and

do you have any advice for aspiring music artists that feel they're not meeting their personal expectations (and are really bummed out about it)

      this may not be what you want to hear, but i think it's time to go ahead and start making the music

11.9.20  8:40 pm   I just won the world's dumbest game, where is my reward?

      you get to play again

11.9.20  8:28 pm   Can you lift up the whole entire world yet?

      no

11.9.20  8:04 pm   If I like music why don't I listen to it

      maybe your desire to make your own music has become so strong that when you hear other people's great music it sends you into a fit of raging jealousy

11.9.20  7:43 pm   would you say in interpersonal relationships of past and present some things are better left alone and one should just accept them for what they are, or are you more of a "if it moves you enough and you can do something, do it" kind of guy?

      my general rule is, leave some things alone and do not leave other things alone

11.9.20  7:29 pm   For me, your videos always bring a sense of coziness/homeliness. Is that the feeling you attempt to recreate with your videos

     yes, even better, hopefully create it for the first time

      or is it just meant to be weird?

      weirdness is more of a side dish

11.9.20  6:50 pm   have you considered learning to can vegetables?

      no

11.9.20  6:25 pm   Hey, I really like your creations. Some of them resonate with me on deep levels, and some are just fun to experience. I think you're pretty great and I hope you're having a good day. 

      holy updated store hours, you are very friendly

11.9.20  6:15 pm   If your favorite song that you made is the one that is coming out, does that mean that the others are no longer your favorites?

      i would prefer to try to make them as good as i can. how good they actually turned out to be is probably something that can never truly be determined

11.9.20  6:01 pm   How's school going bro?

      never heard of it

11.9.20  5:43 pm   thoughts on covid?

     not recommended

     do you think of it as a person?

      no

11.9.20  5:32 pm   Is world just a big black hole of disappointment? 

      no

11.9.20  5:27 pm   do you want to release an album?

      i would prefer to release the songs individually. or, if i prefer something more complex, i would prefer to do it in a video with various types of storytelling with music also included and inter-mingled with it, rather than just a list of songs with no video. so in that sense i would prefer to do either more or less than an album. an album seems like the worst of both worlds for me

11.9.20  5:14 pm   What are you working on

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

11.9.20  4:36 pm   What's wrong with the world?

      sometimes it seems too round, can't figure out which way is up. then i remember that that is probably for our own benefit
